author: fdmanana
msg: Improved replicator's multipart sending/receiving
Messages exchanged between the multipart parser and the
client process are now tagged with references. This ensures
that when retrying a multipart request the client doesn't
get old data messages from the previous request attempt.

author: fdmanana
msg: Improved replication task status update
The status text for replication tasks is now like:
"Processed 28737 / 102201 changes"
This gives users an idea about a replication's progress.

author: fdmanana
msg: Add since_seq parameter to replication documents
This optional parameter allows a user to start a replication
from a specified source database sequence number (similar to
the ?since=SeqNum parameter for /db/_changes/). The advantage
of this is that to replicate very large databases, the user
can copy the database file into another server (via rsync for
example) and then start a continuous replication with the
"since_seq" parameter set to the value of the copy's update
sequence number, speeding up the replication process.
This parameter, and its purpose, was discussed in COUCHDB-892.

author: robweir
msg: CMS commit to openofficeorg by robweir
